ModMetaData.name: Potato Cannon
ModMetaData.author: Y0ghurt
ModMetaData.description: V1.00 It adds a potato cannon! A cannon that shoots potatoes! Taters ftw! Too hyped? NO! IT'S AWESOME! Research prerequisites: - Gunsmithing Crafts at the Machining Table using: - 40x Steel - 50x Potato Skill requirement to craft: - None VERSION 1.0 Features: - It's a potato cannon. You know you want one. Probably more than one.
